#summary Welcome to the ActionScript 3 Flickr Library
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The Flickr library is an ActionScript 3.0 API for the online photo sharing application, Flickr. It provides access to the entire Flickr API.


= Details =
You can [http://code.google.com/p/as3flickrlib/downloads/list download the .zip file], [http://code.google.com/p/as3flickrlib/source check the source code out of SVN], [http://groups.google.com/group/as3flickrlib join the mailing list].  Members of the project can also edit the wiki, email one of the project admins to become a member.


API Functionality includes:
  * File Upload (in source)
  * More...

=Authors=
  * Darron Schall
